reviews.review_msg: Unfair about PSYC201W final proposel data analyis.,however, when I want to do it in TA class, Due to a strike by the school's teaching assistants my turn to collect data from presentations was disrupted. This resulted in me not having time to collect data.Diana Lim still deducted 10 points from me for "not collecting data".

Overall, Dr. Lim was a great lecturer with clear slides and got straight to the point. The only thing I want to point out is that she is a very tough grader, and removed 15% for each day/hour late, which brings lots of anxiety, especially during a pandemic. I just wish she showed more empathy towards students' circumstances right now.

Prof Lam is awesome! Her lectures are short and interesting. She explains concepts super clearly. Her canvas modules and organization overall is great. The assignments are very straightforward and each one prepares you for the final essay. The one qualm I had was I wasn't able to find research in the topic I got (Photographic Memory) since 2010.
This prof is pretty rude and doesnt respect student. His attitude makes students unconfortable and even highly depressed. Never take class with him.
Bad prof, never use internet, no ppt send to student, just show in class. No useful text book, everything you need take from class.
Very interesting lectures. He makes it very clear what we need to study for exams. Sends lecture notes to our emails. Awesome teacher!

A very time-consuming but interesting course! Be prepared to do a LOT of writing. Professor mainly reads off lecture slides but occasionally throws in his own witty comments to keep people from falling asleep. TA was very informative and helpful. If you are interested in psychology, take this course :)
